name: Solid Sphere
description:
What it is

This game is an Adventure Game where you control a Sphere, theres cool different features!

NOTE:

This game is NOWHERE near finished. This is only the testing, expect larger updates to come soon.

It may not work on WINDOWS because this game was made on a Macbook.

Why is the file size so large?

I'm using a converter to convert the projects I made into these applications, the converter already has a pretty large size.
